Description: Book of the Dead: full colour vignettes; red and black ink.
Curator's comments: Published: Piankoff, Wanderings of the Soul (1974): pls.17-33.To be included in a study of BD spell 168 by Marcus Mueller (Bonn).

See M. Mueller-Roth, F. Weber in R. Lucarelli et al (ed.), Heraugehen am Tage: Gesammelte Schriften zum altaegyptischen Totenbuch (SAT 17; Wiesbaden: Harrassowitz 2012), p. 126-8. Müller-Roth, M. and F. Weber 2010. Neue Quellen des Grüftebuchs (Tb 168). Göttinger Miszellen 226, 63-75.

Mosher, Malcom Jr. 2016. The Book of the Dead, Saite through Ptolemaic periods : a study of traditions evident in versions of texts and vignettes (SPBD Studies), vol. I (BD Spells 1-15) and II (BD Spells 16, 18-30), Charleston.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (134513) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/134513)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fractured Black ink Red ink Pigment (cracked) Backed: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Sandwich: board Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: good
